mapper.insert: insert into course(course_name, course_teacher_id, course_place, course_day, course_session) values (#{courseName}, (select teacher_id from teacher where teacher_name = #{courseTeacherName}), #{coursePlace}, #{courseDay}, #{courseSession})
mapper.select: select course_id from course left join teacher t on t.teacher_id = course.course_teacher_id where course_name=#{courseName} and t.teacher_name=#{teacherName}
